name: XITASO GmbH
tagline: eXperts in IT And SOftware Solutions
description:
Since 2012 our experts at XITASO have worked on high-end software solutions for our clients.
Now, we employ 68 people at our company location in Augsburg – and are still looking for new talent!
XITASO stands for interdisciplinary integration of engineering requirements and multimedia software – customized, individual, efficient and flexible.
We focus on the following areas:
ENGINEERING SOFTWARE
MOBILE APPS
WEB APPLICATIONS
IT CONSULTING
